Content.Data:
==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 10.2.6
==Policy Statement==
Log logging subsystem events.
==Policy Purpose==
Log initialization of the logging subsystem to help identify whether the logging subsystem has been disabled to conceal malicious activity.
==Related Guidance==
*[[c82d2c60-211c-4c18-abbc-6af81b922991|Log Logging Events]]
==Related Checklist Items==
* [[eb3b7c59-ed1b-4452-9276-f963342990c5|Logging Events Are Logged]]
